games.name: Bottle Jump 3D
games.description: Master the art of bottle flipping in this addictive 3D challenge. Navigate through obstacles and land perfect flips on moving platforms.

games.name: Stack Tower
games.description: Test your precision and balance skills by stacking blocks as high as possible. One wrong move and your tower comes tumbling down!

games.name: Perfect Balance
games.description: Rotate and stack shapes to achieve perfect balance in this physics puzzle masterpiece. Can you solve all the challenging levels?

games.name: Jump King
games.description: Climb to the top in this challenging precision platformer. Every jump matters - one mistake sends you tumbling back down!

games.name: Getting Over It
games.description: Navigate treacherous terrain with just a hammer and determination. A philosophical journey about perseverance and overcoming obstacles.

games.name: Physics Drop
games.description: Use physics and gravity to guide objects to their targets. Simple concept, challenging execution - perfect for puzzle lovers!
